alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bennington and west central Windham Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arlington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Stratton, West Wardsboro, Searsburg, Glastenbury, Somerset, Podunk, Chiselville, Kelley Stand, South Wardsboro, Medburyville, Kansas, Macintyre, Fayville, East Arlington, West Dover and East Kansas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
